name: Qiu Tuan
story: Wei Sun was born in a small village in rural China. He joined the military at a young age, hoping to see the world and serve his country. He quickly rose through the ranks and became a skilled soldier. Despite his success, Wei Sun is a solitary man and has never married. His calm nature and attention to detail make him a valuable member of his unit, but he longs for a sense of purpose beyond the battlefield.
